overview:
Benjamin Theriault is the current SVP of sales for GfK Custom Research North America. The practice he represents, Digital Market Intelligence (DMI), is one that strives to connect the consumer purchase cycle, providing campaign-centric performance data for digital and cross-media advertising investments.

A tenured professional in the Digital Media and Information Services industries; Ben is a recognized sales manager and business development executive with a proven record for setting sales and pricing strategy; launching new technology to market; developing additional lines of business; expanding the sales base; achieving profitability and maximizing valuation for start-up and early-stage companies.

Ben is an innovative and extremely productive participant at industry events, as well as a frequent speaker and panel moderator.

degrees.subject: Marketing & Finance
degrees.institution: Sigmund Weis School of Business, Susquehanna University

milestones.description: Presented @ OMMA Video: Data to support Smartphone and Tablet adoption / impact on attitudes and behavior as it relates to consumption of TV and/or movies.
milestones.source_description: GfK Digital Market Intelligence Will Share Insights on Mobile Device Use at OMMA Video Conference

milestones.description: Panelist for OMMA Video "On Devices": represented GfK DMI; supplied data to support video consumption on devices / behaviors / attitudes / effectiveness.
milestones.source_description: GfK Digital Market Intelligence Will Share Insights on Mobile Device Use at OMMA Video Conference
